item.title: 学术论文
item.description: Submitted Xianshi Yu and Ji Zhu (2023+). Modeling Hypergraphs with Diversity and Heterogeneous Popularity. Under revision. Accepted/Published Xianshi Yu and Ji Zhu (2023). Network community detection using higher order structures. Biometrika, accepted. Bing-Yi Jing, Ting Li, Ningchen Ying and Xianshi Yu (2022). Community detection in sparse networks using the symmetrized Laplacian inverse matrix (SLIM). Statistica Sinica, 32, 1-12. (The authors are ordered alphabetically.)   Shirley Cohen-Mekelburg, Tony Van, Xianshi Yu, Deena Kelly Costa, Milisa Manojlovich,
